channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous screw coming off the stairs of the slide, 23rd August
item.description:
London field playground north area, 6+M.Serious concerns about the safety and cleanliness of the playground. There is a loose, protruding screw coming off the stairs of the slide, which poses a significant risk to children and babies using the facilities.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Martello Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Regular flytipping, dumping of commercial vehicles and use of public space as storage., 23rd August
item.description:
This area has regular fly tipping due to being used by as a storage area on the pavement and a commercial vehicle storage area by a “business” based in private house close by. Street cleaners cannot gain access and Utility companies have been unable to access vital assets in the past. This latest pavement flytipping in last week. Dumping of commercial vehicles on Berryhill, Earlshall and Glenesk roads Twenty plus years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 84, Glenesk Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
